name: Eggs with Minced Pork
ingredients: Eggs, Ground Pork, Salt, Soy Sauce
instructions: Mash ground pork onto a lip plate. In a separate bowl, mix eggs, water, soy sauce, and salt. Pour wet ingredients onto the pork and steam/simmer until set (~15 mins)

name: Sichuan Crispy Pork
ingredients: Pork Belly, Egg, Salt, Sugar, Oyster Sauce, Water Chestnut Powder
instructions: Rinse the pork. Remove skin and excess fat, leaving a thin layer. Slice into small pieces. Mix 1 egg, salt, sugar (3x), and oyster sauce. Marinate for at least 3 hours. Coat in water chestnut powder and deep fry until golden brown

name: Braised Pork Belly
ingredients: Pork Belly, Ginger, Soy Sauce, Star Anise, 5 Spice Powder, Sugar, Salt
instructions: Slice ginger into coins. Slice pork into small pieces. Parboil in salted water and drain. Caramelize rock sugar or infuse ginger with oil. Add pork and brown. Mix soy sauce, star anise, 5 spice powder, sugar, salt, and enough cold water to cover the pork. Simmer for at least 25 mins
